itunes:title: Episode 655 - Special Guest Street Reporter James Klug
title: Episode 655 - Special Guest Street Reporter James Klug
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with "man of the street" journalist James Klug who recently just returned from covering the Portland protests where he lived for a week straight.  The coverage of what is happening there is shocking.
